mediator

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • mediator.Vehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colleague<Incident>

    public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Colleague<Incident>
    A small simulation of a vehicle. Main features are sending and receiving warnings about incidents in specific geographic locations
